name: Final Fright Alpha
description:
Final Fright Alpha is a short horror game here to test out specific mechanics for my game Final Fright: Deep Beneath. I would appreciate a response and some feedback to my game if it can be provided. I do want to make this game the best it can be.

Instructions------------

Your goal is to find 3 items scattered around the map and bring them back to the life support agent. You don't seem to be the only one on the ship though. While trying to avoid the creature you can hide in vines bathed in red light. If the creature gets you it's game over. Items can appear in chests and on tables.

Controls------------------

To open chests use the left mouse button

To pick up items use the left mouse button

To place items use the left mouse button
